bench_press.name: Bench Press
bench_press.instruction: 3 sets x 8-10 reps. Control the descent, explosive press up.

weighted_pullup.name: Weighted Pull-Up
weighted_pullup.instruction: 3 sets x 8-12 reps. Add weight with belt or dumbbell between feet. Full range of motion.

lat_pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
lat_pulldown.instruction: 3 sets x 8-12 reps. Alternative to pull-ups. Squeeze shoulder blades together at bottom.

overhead_press.name: Overhead Press
overhead_press.instruction: 3 sets x 10 reps. Standing position. Critical for load-bearing stability.

tbar_row.name: T-Bar Row
tbar_row.instruction: 3 sets x 10-12 reps. Keep back flat, pull to upper abs.

dumbbell_row.name: Dumbbell Row
dumbbell_row.instruction: 3 sets x 10-12 reps. Alternative to T-bar. One arm at a time, keep core braced.

weighted_plank.name: Weighted Plank
weighted_plank.instruction: Hold with plate on back. Keep core tight, hips level.

hanging_leg_raise.name: Hanging Leg Raise
hanging_leg_raise.instruction: Control the movement. Raise legs to 90 degrees or higher.

back_squat.name: Back Squat
back_squat.instruction: 3 sets x 8 reps. Bar on upper back, break parallel depth.

rdl_combat.name: Romanian Deadlift
rdl_combat.instruction: 3 sets x 10-12 reps. Hinge at hips, feel the hamstring stretch. Strengthens lower back.

vo2max_intervals.name: VO2 Max Intervals (4x4)
vo2max_intervals.instruction: 4 rounds: 4 min at 90% max heart rate, 3 min easy recovery jog/walk.

weighted_dips.name: Weighted Dips
weighted_dips.instruction: 3 sets to failure. Add weight with belt. Keep torso slightly forward.

seated_cable_row.name: Seated Cable Row
seated_cable_row.instruction: 3 sets x 12-15 reps. Pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

decline_pushup.name: Decline/Weighted Push-Up
decline_pushup.instruction: 3 sets x 15-20 reps. Feet elevated or add weight plate on back.

bicep_curl.name: Bicep Curl
bicep_curl.instruction: 2 sets. Dumbbells or barbell. Control the eccentric phase.

tricep_extension.name: Tricep Extension
tricep_extension.instruction: 2 sets. Cable or dumbbell overhead. Full extension at bottom.

walking_lunge.name: Walking Lunges with Dumbbells
walking_lunge.instruction: 3 sets x 20 steps. Simulates tactical movement with load. Keep torso upright.

leg_extension.name: Leg Extension Machine
leg_extension.instruction: 3 sets x 12-15 reps. Isolated quad work. Squeeze at top.

leg_curl_machine.name: Leg Curl Machine
leg_curl_machine.instruction: 3 sets x 12-15 reps. Isolated hamstring work. Control the release.

zone2_run_short.name: Zone 2 Run (Short)
zone2_run_short.instruction: 20-30 min at easy pace. Active recovery, clears lactic acid.

hip_mobility.name: Hip Mobility Work
hip_mobility.instruction: Dynamic stretches and hip circles. Focus on full range of motion.

ankle_mobility.name: Ankle Mobility Work
ankle_mobility.instruction: Ankle circles and stretch. Essential for combat movement.

static_stretching.name: Static Stretching
static_stretching.instruction: Hold each stretch 30-60 seconds. Full body coverage.

long_walk.name: Long Walk
long_walk.instruction: Optional if energy permits. Low intensity active recovery.

zone2_run_long.name: Zone 2 Long Run
zone2_run_long.instruction: 60-90 min at comfortable pace. HR 130-145 bpm. Builds endurance base while preserving muscle.
